request.description:
### Retrieve Product Details

This endpoint retrieves the details of a specific product identified by the `productId`.

#### Request

- Method: `GET`
- URL: `{{baseUrl}}/api/products/:productId`

#### Response

The response will be a JSON object with the following schema:

```json
{
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "id": { "type": "string" },
    "name": { "type": "string" },
    "description": { "type": "string" },
    "model": { "type": "string" },
    "sku": { "type": "string" },
    "cost": { "type": "number" },
    "imageUrl": { "type": "string" }
  }
}
```

response.name: Product retrieved successfully
response.body:
{
  "id": "a1805cde-f34f-4945-9fec-3e096fef4bdd",
  "name": "Bose Noise Cancelling Over-Ear Headphones 700 (Black)",
  "description": "- 11 levels of noise cancelling\n- Google Assistant and Amazon Alexa built in\n- 20 hours of battery life\n",
  "model": "794297-0100",
  "sku": "394807",
  "cost": 445,
  "imageUrl": "https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0024/9803/5810/products/394807-Product-0-I_d1664990-4dfb-462f-bb93-2fb469ed7d5d_800x800.jpg"
}

request.description:
### Update Product Details

This endpoint allows the client to update the details of a specific product.

#### Request

- Method: PUT
    
- URL: {{baseUrl}}/api/products/:productId
    
- Body:
    - name (string, required): The name of the product.
        
    - description (string, required): The description of the product.
        
    - model (string, required): The model of the product.
        
    - sku (string, required): The stock keeping unit (SKU) of the product.
        
    - cost (number, required): The cost of the product.
        
    - imageUrl (string, required): The URL of the image for the product.
        

#### Response

The response will be a JSON object with the following properties:

- id (string): The unique identifier of the product.
    
- name (string): The name of the product.
    
- description (string): The description of the product.
    
- model (string): The model of the product.
    
- sku (string): The stock keeping unit (SKU) of the product.
    
- cost (number): The cost of the product.
    
- imageUrl (string): The URL of the image for the product.
    

``` json
{
  "id": "",
  "name": "",
  "description": "",
  "model": "",
  "sku": "",
  "cost": 0,
  "imageUrl": ""
}

 ```

#### Response JSON Schema

``` json
{
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "id": { "type": "string" },
    "name": { "type": "string" },
    "description": { "type": "string" },
    "model": { "type": "string" },
    "sku": { "type": "string" },
    "cost": { "type": "number" },
    "imageUrl": { "type": "string" }
  }
}

 ```
